parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  site_id: $('Final Aggregate').item.json.site?.id || $('Final Aggregate').item.json.siteId,
  request_id: $('Final Aggregate').item.json.requestId,
  instruction: $('Final Aggregate').item.json.message || '',
  plan_json: $('Final Aggregate').item.json.plan || {},
  diff: $('Final Aggregate').item.json.plan?.unifiedDiff || '',
  status: 'preview_ready',
  preview_url: $('Preview Deploy1').item?.json?.previewUrl || $('Create PR1').item?.json?.html_url || '',
  pr_url: $('Create PR1').item?.json?.html_url || '',
  created_at: new Date().toISOString()
}) }}
